Stem: Grey-green, sometimes covered in small white hairs, up to 15 cm diameter in cross section.
Leaves: Densely hairy, yellowish-green above and paler greyish-green underneath. 9-30 cm long, tapering at both ends. With strong diesel-like smell when crushed.
Flowers: Bluish or purplish with bright yellow centres, typical nightshade flowers. Star-shaped with 5 petals, and in clusters.
FruitSeeds: Round 10-15 mm diameter in clusters. Green ripening to dull yellow. Containing 150-200 seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Size and growth habit distinguish from other Nightshades (*Solanum sp*).
